titleStmt.title: The gods are men: or The mortality of persons in places of magistracy. As it was explained and applied in a sermon preached at the assize holden at Hertford for that county on March 15. 1656/7. By George Swinnocke M.A. last Fellow of Bailiol Colledge in Oxford, and now preacher of the gospel at Rickmersworth in Hertfordshire.
titleStmt.author: Swinnock, George, 1627-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for N. VVebb, and VV. Grantham at the Beare over against the little North-door in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Beare over against the little North-door in Pauls Church-yard
